description: So it's more cumbersome than it should be. Can't recommend.
summary: Incomplete: can't BROWSE for a file

description:
I don't understand why this basic functionality has been removed from Ubuntu, but this app fixes it. If you want your newly made app-shortcut in the app drawer (instead or in addition to the Desktop), just move (or copy) the .desktop file to /home/YOURUSERNAME/.local/share/applications

PS: Remember to make the shortcut launchable / exutable.
